mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.tenant_id, u.username, u.email, u.mobile, u.nick_name, u.real_name, u.password, u.status, u.created_time createdTime, u.ssex sex, u.dept_id deptId, u.last_login_time lastLoginTime, u.modify_time modifyTime, u.description, u.avatar, d.name deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.id) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.ROLE_NAME) roleName FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.id) LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} group by u.username,u.id,u.email,u.mobile,u.password, u.status,u.created_time,u.ssex,u.dept_id ,u.last_login_time,u.modify_time,u.description,u.avatar

SELECT u.id, u.tenant_id, u.username, u.email, u.mobile, u.nick_name, u.real_name, u.password, u.status, u.created_time createdTime, u.ssex sex, u.dept_id deptId, u.last_login_time lastLoginTime, u.modify_time modifyTime, u.description, u.avatar, d.dept_name deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.id) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.ROLE_NAME) roleName FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.id) LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.mobile = #{mobile} OR u.username = #{mobile} group by u.username,u.id,u.email,u.mobile,u.password, u.status,u.created_time,u.ssex,u.dept_id ,u.last_login_time,u.modify_time,u.description,u.avatar
